# Installation

This script is used as a default template on Posit Cloud to install the required packages needed to run the course.

```{r}

install.packages(c("devtools", 
                   "usethis", 
                   "knitr", 
                   "tidyverse", 
                   "ggthemes", 
                   "palmerpenguins",
                   "gt"))

```

```{r}
library(devtools)
library(usethis)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(gt)

```
